title: WA bushfire emergency enters second day as temperature set to hit 42C
description: Hundreds of homes in the Mid West city of Geraldton remain under threat from an out-of-control bushfire, with firefighters battling extremely hot, dry and windy conditions.
content:
One home has been lost and hundreds of others are under threat from an emergency bushfire authorities suspect was deliberately lit in the West Australian city of Geraldton.
Dozens of firefighters ar… [+4836 chars]
de: Der Waldbrand-Notfall in Washington beginnt am zweiten Tag, die Temperatur soll 42 °C erreichen. Hunderte Häuser in der Stadt Geraldton im Mittleren Westen sind weiterhin von einem außer Kontrolle geratenen Buschfeuer bedroht, wobei die Feuerwehrleute mit extrem heißen, trockenen und windigen Bedingungen zu kämpfen haben.
en: WA bushfire emergency enters second day as temperature set to hit 42C. Hundreds of homes in the Mid West city of Geraldton remain under threat from an out-of-control bushfire, with firefighters battling extremely hot, dry and windy conditions.
la: WA bushfire subitis secundo die intrat sicut temperies ad feriendum 42C. Centum domorum in urbe media Occidentali Geraldton manent minari ab autocineto obsoleto, cum globulis pugnantibus valde calidis, siccis et ventosis conditionibus.

title: A Loophole Allows Ranchers to Renew Grazing Permits With Little Scrutiny of the Environmental Impact
description: With dwindling oversight, cattle are grazing where they’re not supposed to and in greater numbers or for longer periods than permitted. This can spread invasive plants, pushing out native species and worsening wildfire risk.
content:
• Cattle Guard: Every 10 years, permits to graze on public lands are supposed to be reviewed in order to address livestocks impact on the environment.
  • Skipping Scrutiny: A 2014 law, whi… [+21668 chars]
de: Eine Lücke ermöglicht es Viehzüchtern, Weidegenehmigungen zu erneuern, ohne die Umweltauswirkungen genau zu prüfen. Da die Kontrolle schwindet, grasen Rinder dort, wo sie nicht hingehören, und zwar in größerer Zahl oder für längere Zeiträume als erlaubt. Dies kann zur Ausbreitung invasiver Pflanzen führen, einheimische Arten verdrängen und das Risiko von Waldbränden erhöhen.
en: A Loophole Allows Ranchers to Renew Grazing Permits With Little Scrutiny of the Environmental Impact. With dwindling oversight, cattle are grazing where they’re not supposed to and in greater numbers or for longer periods than permitted. This can spread invasive plants, pushing out native species and worsening wildfire risk.
la: Loophole permittit Ranchers innovare Tityrus Permittit Cum Parva Scrutinium Environmental Impact. In inspectione obscura, pascuntur pecora ubi non supponuntur, et plures vel pluries quam permittuntur. Haec plantas incursiones spargere potest, species indigenas impellens et periculum ignem ferum augens.

title: 'A very sad day': Farmer killed fighting bushfire on WA's south coast
description: The WA premier describes the death of the man, who was killed while fighting a fast-moving bushfire near Ravensthorpe, as "devastating".
content:
A farmer has been killed while fighting a fast-moving bushfire on Western Australia's south coast.
Police said a man in his 60's, believed to be a local resident, was operating a front-end loader to… [+2663 chars]
de: „Ein sehr trauriger Tag“: Bauer wurde im Kampf gegen Buschfeuer an der Südküste von Washington getötet. Der Premierminister von Washington beschreibt den Tod des Mannes, der bei der Bekämpfung eines sich schnell ausbreitenden Buschfeuers in der Nähe von Ravensthorpe getötet wurde, als „verheerend“.
en: 'A very sad day': Farmer killed fighting bushfire on WA's south coast. The WA premier describes the death of the man, who was killed while fighting a fast-moving bushfire near Ravensthorpe, as "devastating".
la: 'Dies tristissima': Agricola bushfire in WA meridiana oram dimicans occidit. WA premier describit mortem hominis, qui dum incendium rapidum prope Ravensthorpe pugnans occisus est, quasi "vastando".

title: Breaking: Farmer killed fighting bushfire on WA's south coast
description: The man was killed during a fast moving bushfire which tore through more than 4,000ha near Ravensthorpe
content:
A farmer has been killed while fighting a fast-moving bushfire on Western Australias south coast.
Police said a man in his 60's, believed to be a local resident, was operating a front-end loader to … [+149 chars]
de: Eilmeldung: Bauer wurde im Kampf gegen Buschfeuer an der Südküste von Washington getötet. Der Mann wurde bei einem sich schnell ausbreitenden Buschfeuer getötet, das mehr als 4.000 Hektar in der Nähe von Ravensthorpe verwüstete
en: Breaking: Farmer killed fighting bushfire on WA's south coast. The man was killed during a fast moving bushfire which tore through more than 4,000ha near Ravensthorpe
la: Breaking: Agricola pugnans bushfire in WA meridiem oram occidit. Homo interfectus est in bushfire celeriter movente, qui plus quam 4.000ha apud Ravensthorpe discidit

title: In 1939, a Royal Commission found burning forests leads to more bushfires. But this cycle of destruction can be stopped
description: After devastating fires in 1939, authorities began burning forests to reduce fuel load. But we now know this creates conditions for even worse fires.
content:
A planned burn near Perth, Western Australia. Posnov/Getty
Every year, government workers around Australia start fires in the bush. The idea behind these prescribed burning programs is that removing… [+10280 chars]
de: Im Jahr 1939 stellte eine königliche Kommission fest, dass brennende Wälder zu mehr Buschbränden führen. Aber dieser Kreislauf der Zerstörung kann gestoppt werden. Nach verheerenden Bränden im Jahr 1939 begannen die Behörden, Wälder niederzubrennen, um die Treibstoffbelastung zu verringern. Aber wir wissen jetzt, dass dies die Voraussetzungen für noch schlimmere Brände schafft.
en: In 1939, a Royal Commission found burning forests leads to more bushfires. But this cycle of destruction can be stopped. After devastating fires in 1939, authorities began burning forests to reduce fuel load. But we now know this creates conditions for even worse fires.
la: Anno MCMXXXIX, Commissio Regiae silvas ardentes ad plus frutices invenit. Sed hic cyclus destructionis potest obstrui. Post incendia vastata anno MCMXXXIX, auctores silvas incendere ad focum oneris reducere coeperunt. Sed nunc scimus hanc condiciones in pejoribus incendiis creare.

title: From earthquakes to wildfires, Canada is woefully ill-prepared for disasters
description: Canadians faces a growing safety crisis yet they remain unprepared. The real danger is complacency.
content: A fault line in Canadas Yukon territory has stirred after more than 12,000 years of geological sleep. Researchers studying the Tintina Fault, which stretches 1,000 kilometres from northeast British C… [+5631 chars]
de: Von Erdbeben bis hin zu Waldbränden ist Kanada auf Katastrophen äußerst schlecht vorbereitet. Die Kanadier stehen vor einer wachsenden Sicherheitskrise, sind jedoch weiterhin unvorbereitet. Die wahre Gefahr ist Selbstzufriedenheit.
en: From earthquakes to wildfires, Canada is woefully ill-prepared for disasters. Canadians faces a growing safety crisis yet they remain unprepared. The real danger is complacency.
la: A terrae motibus ad incendia ignium, Canada calamitatibus lacrimabiliter paratur. Canadenses spectat ad discrimen securitatis crescentis nondum imparati manent. Periculum verum est complacentia.

Der Energieversorger arbeitet mit Rhizome mit Sitz in Washington D.C. zusammen, einem Planungsunternehmen für Netzstabilität, um potenzielle Zündgefahren in ganz … zu identifizieren und zu verhindern.

title: Rancher shares surprising before-and-after footage proving unexpected benefit of owning goats: 'Astonishing'
description: "We can create a better chance for healthy trees and plants to withstand a wildfire."
content:
Goats are all the rage in landscape management, and they can even help save lives by minimizing wildfire risks.
As TikToker Cowboy Max (@cowboymax) showed, the four-legged animals can do the best ki… [+2347 chars]
de: Rancher teilt überraschende Vorher-Nachher-Aufnahmen, die den unerwarteten Nutzen des Ziegenbesitzes belegen: „Erstaunlich“. „Wir können dafür sorgen, dass gesunde Bäume und Pflanzen einem Waldbrand besser standhalten.“
en: Rancher shares surprising before-and-after footage proving unexpected benefit of owning goats: 'Astonishing'. "We can create a better chance for healthy trees and plants to withstand a wildfire."
la: Rancher participat mirum ante et post footage probans inopinatum beneficium possidendi capras: 'Mirum'. "Possumusne meliorem creare arbores ac plantas sanos ut ignem ferum sustinere."

title: What America Can Learn from Its Largest Wildfire of the Year
description: M. R. O’Connor on the Dragon Bravo Fire, the largest wildfire of 2025, which burned at the North Rim of Grand Canyon National Park in Arizona, and what it means for managed wildfires.
content: An evacuation order spread across the entire North Rim. Robin Bies, a staff member at the Kaibab Lodge, some fifteen miles to the north, drove two hikers and their grandchildren to the South Rim, fou… [+4292 chars]
de: Was Amerika aus seinem größten Waldbrand des Jahres lernen kann. M. R. O’Connor über das Dragon-Bravo-Feuer, den größten Waldbrand des Jahres 2025, der am Nordrand des Grand-Canyon-Nationalparks in Arizona brannte, und was das für bewältigte Waldbrände bedeutet.
en: What America Can Learn from Its Largest Wildfire of the Year. M. R. O’Connor on the Dragon Bravo Fire, the largest wildfire of 2025, which burned at the North Rim of Grand Canyon National Park in Arizona, and what it means for managed wildfires.
la: Quid America discere potest ex maximo INCAENDIUM Anni. M. R. O'Connor de Draco Bravo Ignis, ignis ferus maximus 2025, qui in Rimo Septentrionali Magnae Canyon National Park in Arizona combussit, et quid significat ad ignes ignitos administrandos.

title: 94-year-old woman still homeless after Long Lake wildfire
description: Ruth Manuel says she wants to return home to West Dalhousie after the home she shared with her son and his partner was destroyed in the Long Lake wildfire. The fire razed 20 homes and 11 outbuildings.
content:
It's been more than two months since roughly a thousand residents of the West Dalhousie, N.S., area went home after being evacuated due to the Long Lake wildfire.
Ruth Manuel wasn't one of them.
Iv… [+3603 chars]
de: 94-jährige Frau nach dem Waldbrand in Long Lake immer noch obdachlos. Ruth Manuel sagt, sie möchte nach West Dalhousie zurückkehren, nachdem das Haus, das sie mit ihrem Sohn und seinem Partner teilte, beim Waldbrand in Long Lake zerstört wurde. Das Feuer zerstörte 20 Häuser und 11 Nebengebäude.
en: 94-year-old woman still homeless after Long Lake wildfire. Ruth Manuel says she wants to return home to West Dalhousie after the home she shared with her son and his partner was destroyed in the Long Lake wildfire. The fire razed 20 homes and 11 outbuildings.
la: XCIV annorum femina adhuc profugo post Long lacum ignem ferum. Ruth Manuel dicit se velle domum ad West Dalhousiam reverti postquam domum suam cum filio communicavit et socium suum in Longo laco ignem ferum interiit. Ignis diruta XX domos et XI doma.

title: 'Everything's gone': Man who lost home in Geraldton fires grateful for support
description: A home owner who lost his house and his cat to a bushfire in Geraldton, in WA's Mid West, says "karma" is looking for anyone who may have deliberately lit the blazes.
content: A home owner who lost his house and his cat to a bushfire in Geraldton, in WA's Mid West, says "karma" is looking for anyone who may have deliberately lit the blazes, as authorities investigate the s… [+4490 chars]
de: „Alles ist weg“: Mann, der sein Zuhause in Geraldton verloren hat, ist dankbar für die Unterstützung. Ein Hausbesitzer, der sein Haus und seine Katze durch ein Buschfeuer in Geraldton im Mittleren Westen Washingtons verloren hat, sagt, „Karma“ suche nach jemandem, der die Flammen möglicherweise absichtlich angezündet habe.
en: 'Everything's gone': Man who lost home in Geraldton fires grateful for support. A home owner who lost his house and his cat to a bushfire in Geraldton, in WA's Mid West, says "karma" is looking for anyone who may have deliberately lit the blazes.
la: 'Omnia abierunt': homo qui domum in Geraldtono ignes amisit, pro auxilio gratus fuit. Domum possessorem qui domum suam et felem suum ad fruticem ignis amisit in Geraldton, in WA scriptor Mid West, dicit "karma" aliquem quaerit qui flammas consulto accenderit.

title: Wildfire-related PM2.5 and respiratory transmitted disease among Chinese children and adolescents from 2008 to 2019: A retrospective study
description: In a retrospective analysis of national surveillance data in China over a 12 year period, Li Chen and colleagues find that short-term exposure to wildfire-related fine particulate matter (PM2.5) was associated with a higher incidence of respiratory transmitte…
content:
Principal findings
Leveraging a comprehensive nationwide surveillance dataset spanning 12 years, our study established a significant correlation between exposure to wildfire-related PM2.5 and an ele… [+12038 chars]
de: Durch Waldbrände verursachte PM2,5- und Atemwegserkrankungen bei chinesischen Kindern und Jugendlichen von 2008 bis 2019: Eine retrospektive Studie. In einer retrospektiven Analyse nationaler Überwachungsdaten in China über einen Zeitraum von 12 Jahren stellen Li Chen und Kollegen fest, dass eine kurzfristige Exposition gegenüber Feinstaub (PM2,5) im Zusammenhang mit Waldbränden mit einer höheren Inzidenz von Atemwegsinfektionen verbunden war.
en: Wildfire-related PM2.5 and respiratory transmitted disease among Chinese children and adolescents from 2008 to 2019: A retrospective study. In a retrospective analysis of national surveillance data in China over a 12 year period, Li Chen and colleagues find that short-term exposure to wildfire-related fine particulate matter (PM2.5) was associated with a higher incidence of respiratory transmitte…
la: INCAENDIUM actis PM2.5 et respiratorium morbum transmisit inter filios Sinenses et adulescentes a 2008 ad 2019: Studium retrospectivum. In analysi retrospectiva custodiae nationalis data in Sinis per 12 annum tempus, Li Chen et collegae inveniunt breve tempus expositionis ad ignem ignitum relatum denique materiam particulatam (PM2.5) cum altiori incidentiae respiratorii transmitte.

title: 'We've lost everything': Australia wildfire rips through homes
description: Multiple homes were left damaged after a wildfire swept through a coastal area north of Sydney.
content:
At least 12 homes were either destroyed or damaged when a wildfire swept through a coastal area north of Sydney, local authorities said.
The blaze broke out in the town of Koolewong, New South Wales… [+318 chars]
de: „Wir haben alles verloren“: Ein Waldbrand in Australien wütet in Häusern. Mehrere Häuser wurden beschädigt, nachdem ein Waldbrand ein Küstengebiet nördlich von Sydney verwüstet hatte.
en: 'We've lost everything': Australia wildfire rips through homes. Multiple homes were left damaged after a wildfire swept through a coastal area north of Sydney.
la: 'Omnia perdidimus': Australia ignem ferum per domos lacerat. Multae domos relictae sunt post ignem ferum per aream maritimam Sydnaei septentrionem versus trahentes.

title: Australia activates disaster relief for wildfire-hit New South Wales state
description: SYDNEY, Dec 7 (Reuters) - Australia on Sunday activated disaster relief for residents impacted by wildfires that have burnt properties, infrastructure and thousands of hectares of bushland in the country's most populous state. Read full story

Lesen Sie die ganze Geschichte

title: Australia offers financial help for wildfire-hit state
description: Firefighters have brought the fires that broke out in the state of New South Wales in Australia under control. But the extent of damage will become clearer in the coming days.

en: Australia offers financial help for wildfire-hit state. Firefighters have brought the fires that broke out in the state of New South Wales in Australia under control. But the extent of damage will become clearer in the coming days.
la: Australia auxilium pecuniarium praebet pro statu ignis ignivomo. Firefighters ignes qui in statu Novae Australis Walliae in Australiam dicionem suam eruperunt effecit. Sed quantum damni in diebus futuris clarius fiet.

title: Dozens of West Dalhousie properties receive new civic signs through community initiative
description: The lack of civic signs made it more difficult for firefighters to pinpoint locations during the wildfire earlier this year.
content:
While Justin Oliver, the deputy chief of the Bridgetown Volunteer Fire Department, was fighting the growing Long Lake wildfire, he encountered properties without civic signs. 
This made it hard to p… [+3217 chars]
de: Dutzende Grundstücke in West Dalhousie erhalten durch Gemeinschaftsinitiative neue Bürgerschilder. Das Fehlen von Hinweisschildern erschwerte es den Feuerwehrleuten, die Orte während des Waldbrandes Anfang des Jahres zu lokalisieren.
en: Dozens of West Dalhousie properties receive new civic signs through community initiative. The lack of civic signs made it more difficult for firefighters to pinpoint locations during the wildfire earlier this year.
la: Dozeni Occidentalium Dalhousie possessiones nova signa civilia per inceptum communitatis recipiunt. Defectus signorum civilium difficiliorem fecit firepugnatores ad designandum loca per ignem ignem ferum hoc anno maturius.

title: Australian firefighter killed as bushfires destroy homes in two states
description: SYDNEY, Dec 8 (Reuters) - An Australian firefighter was killed overnight after he was struck by a tree while trying to control a bushfire that had destroyed homes and burnt large swathes of bushland north of Sydney, authorities said on Monday. Read full story

title: White House slams Newsom after gov claims Trump admin turned down LA wildfire aid meeting: ‘No idea what he’s talking about’
description: More than $7 billion in federal funds have been issued to California since January, when the Palisades and Eaton fires torched thousands of acres of land and high-priced homes, but the Golden State governor wants a lot more.
content: The White House tore into Democratic California Gov. Gavin Newsom on Friday after he claimed the Trump administration refused to meet with him Friday during a visit to Washington aimed at securing mo… [+4801 chars]
de: Das Weiße Haus kritisiert Newsom, nachdem die Regierung behauptet, der Trump-Administrator habe das Treffen zur Waldbrandhilfe in L.A. abgelehnt: „Keine Ahnung, wovon er redet.“ Seit Januar, als die Brände in Palisades und Eaton Tausende Hektar Land und teure Häuser niederbrannten, wurden mehr als 7 Milliarden US-Dollar an Bundesmitteln an Kalifornien ausgegeben, aber der Gouverneur des Golden State will noch viel mehr.
en: White House slams Newsom after gov claims Trump admin turned down LA wildfire aid meeting: ‘No idea what he’s talking about’. More than $7 billion in federal funds have been issued to California since January, when the Palisades and Eaton fires torched thousands of acres of land and high-priced homes, but the Golden State governor wants a lot more.
la: Domus Albae slams Newsom postquam praevie vindicat Trump admin convertit LA ignifer auxilium foederis: 'Nulla idea quid de' loquitur. Plus quam $7 miliarda in pecunia foederata in Californiam ab Ianuario edita sunt, cum Palisades et Eton incendia multa milia iugerum agri pretiumque domos contulerunt, sed plus multum cupit praefectus rei publicae Aureae.

title: Drugs, inter-governmental relations and wildfires dominate Sask. fall sitting
description: Premier Scott Moe called this sitting a success, but his government has faced criticism on health care and wildfire response.
content:
Saskatchewan's fall sitting ended with a triumphant Premier Scott Moe touting his government's economic record and plans to tackle the drug crisis.
Over the seven-week sitting, the provincial govern… [+4242 chars]
de: Drogen, zwischenstaatliche Beziehungen und Waldbrände dominieren Sask. Herbstsitzen. Premierminister Scott Moe bezeichnete diese Sitzung als Erfolg, seine Regierung wurde jedoch in Bezug auf das Gesundheitswesen und die Reaktion auf Waldbrände kritisiert.
en: Drugs, inter-governmental relations and wildfires dominate Sask. fall sitting. Premier Scott Moe called this sitting a success, but his government has faced criticism on health care and wildfire response.
la: Medicamenta, relationes inter gubernatores et incendia ignium dominantur Sask. cadunt sedentes. Premier Scott Moe hoc successum sedentem appellavit, sed eius regimen sanitatis cura et responsio in ignem ferum obvenit.

title: Report Asks Washington Lawmakers to Require Insurers to Better Track Wildfire Risk

en: Report Asks Washington Lawmakers to Require Insurers to Better Track Wildfire Risk. A working group on wildfires in Washington wants the state Legislature to consider requiring insurers to internally track instances in which wildfire risk materially contributes to a policy nonrenewal, cancellation or eligibility determination—and to better e…

title: Arizona Study Group Issues Report on Homeowners Insurance and Wildfire Risk
description: A report from a regulator-created group found that a multifaceted approach to addressing wildfires and lack of insurance affordability in Arizona should be tackled with a multifaceted approach that includes homeowners, communities and the state working in tan…
content: A report from a regulator-created group found that a multifaceted approach to addressing wildfires and lack of insurance affordability in Arizona should be tackled with a multifaceted approach that i… [+1740 chars]
de: Die Arizona Study Group veröffentlicht einen Bericht zur Hausbesitzerversicherung und zum Waldbrandrisiko. In einem Bericht einer von der Regulierungsbehörde gegründeten Gruppe wurde festgestellt, dass ein vielschichtiger Ansatz zur Bekämpfung von Waldbränden und mangelnder Erschwinglichkeit von Versicherungen in Arizona mit einem vielschichtigen Ansatz angegangen werden sollte, der Hausbesitzer, Gemeinden und den Staat einbezieht, die zusammenarbeiten.
en: Arizona Study Group Issues Report on Homeowners Insurance and Wildfire Risk. A report from a regulator-created group found that a multifaceted approach to addressing wildfires and lack of insurance affordability in Arizona should be tackled with a multifaceted approach that includes homeowners, communities and the state working in tan…

title: Breaking: Farmer killed in bushfire identified as Ravensthorpe deputy shire president

Heftige Hitze und Winde haben in ganz New South Wales ausgedehnte Buschbrände entfacht, Häuser zerstört und Evakuierungen erzwungen. title: Breaking: Number of homes destroyed in NSW bushfires rises to 20 as recovery efforts begin

title: Manitobans hit by wildfires near Flin Flon weigh decisions on fire protection, rebuilding
description: People in the Flin Flon area who lost cabins and homes, or had theirs threatened, are still dealing with the aftermath of the wildfires more than six months later. They face decisions around fire protection, insurance and whether to rebuild.

Menschen in der Gegend von Flin Flon, die Hütten und Häuser verloren haben oder deren Häuser bedroht waren, müssen mehr als sechs Monate später immer noch mit den Folgen der Waldbrände kämpfen. Sie stehen vor Entscheidungen rund um den Brandschutz, die Versicherung und den Wiederaufbau.
